## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) facing DOWN (output at 15.5, 72.5)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) (full with iron ore)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 68.5) (empty)
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) powering the drill
- Stone furnace at (20.0, 71.0) (fueled but idle)
- Burner inserter at (18.5, 71.5) (fueled, connects chest to furnace)
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 70.5) (fueled, connects furnace to output chest)
- Wooden chest at (22.5, 70.5) (output chest, empty)

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5) - UNCHANGED
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) connected via pipes to:
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) (fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) (connected to power network)
- Pipe network connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Power pole network operational

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement collision errors (continued)
- Verify target position is clear before placing entities (now with 20 total occurrences)
- Added specific water avoidance checks when placing near shorelines (4 water-related placement failures)
- When replacing existing setups, clear old entities first before placing new ones

### Inserter placement issues (updated)
- Ensure proper spacing when placing inserters (6 new failed attempts)
- Verify inserter fuel status before attempting operations
- Check inserter directionality when connecting production chains
- Clear existing entities completely before inserter placement attempts

### Belt connection rules (updated)
- Cannot connect belts directly from chests - must use inserters (3 total occurrences)
- Verify source and destination entity types before attempting belt connections

### Entity verification (updated)
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations (2 new failures)
- Implement position validation before placement attempts
- Check for full chests before expecting mining operations to continue

### Production chain planning (updated)
- Ensure complete clearance of old transport belts before redesigning layouts
- Verify all components are properly spaced before finalizing production chains
- Check furnace input/output connections before expecting operation

### Power system improvements
- Steam engine now properly connected to power network
- Check power network coverage when placing new electrical devices

### Furnace operation
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and input materials before expecting operation
- Monitor furnace fuel levels during operation
- Verify inserter connections to furnaces are functional

## NAMESPACE

### Functions
- find_clear_position(position: Position, min_distance: int) -> Position
  Attempts to find a clear position for entity placement
  Failure: Missing math module import
  Failure: No clear position found error not properly handled

### Variables
- base_position: Position - Stores base coordinates for operations
- iron_drill: Entity - Reference to mining drill entity
- power_pole: Entity - Reference to power pole entity
- furnace: Entity - Reference to furnace entity
- boiler: Entity - Reference to boiler entity (new)
